Home » 40P19 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 7 Pītittika
7.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Pītittika
Paṭiccādivāra
15.
65Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  cattāri.
66Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  cattāri.
67Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
68Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa…pe…  avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
